title: Can someone help me identify what font is this?
content:
Someone help me identify this font please? Thank you.

| --- | --- |
| [DCA.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122070311/http:/typophile.com/files/DCA.jpg) | 180.29 KB |

author: roshen43

comments.content: sorry.. i din mention which font.. its the drums come alive....
Scratch that, was late and offered an… erm … disputable answer.
where can i find that font?

A digitized version should be available as ’Edison Swirl’.  
 [myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/edison-swirl-sg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122070311/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/edison-swirl-sg/)
